range1d.Range1D

range1d.Range1D Class Reference

A Range1D is simply a one-dimensional range, used when projecting Polygon instances onto vectors. More...

Detailed Description

A Range1D is simply a one-dimensional range, used when projecting Polygon instances onto vectors.
